topics.body:
My cousin always asks stuff and before I answer him, I ask him why he asked me.
He always answered 'no reason' but I know he's lying.

How do I shut him up?
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976

topics.body:
"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/537c9b1f6368726045590500#post_537c9b1f6368726045590500
[bq="HJSDGCE"]My cousin always asks stuff and before I answer him, I ask him why he asked me.
He always answered 'no reason' but I know he's lying.

How do I shut him up?[/bq]
Respond with video game NPC quotes.

"Do you know where the duct tape is?"
"Let me guess; someone stole your sweet roll?"

"How hot is it outside?"
"Patrolling the Mojave almost makes you wish for a nuclear winter"
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
The Reuben is the greatest of all sandwiches, there are a few different variations but this one is mine:
Two slices Rye bread
As much pastrami and swiss cheese as you think you can handle.
Russian Dressing.
Sauerkraut, again as much as you want.
mayonnaise
The mayo is so that after building your sandwich you grill it as if making a grilled cheese.
